mcq.statement: What was the real name of Titu Mir, the well-known personality from Western Bengal associated with the movement of Sayyid Ahmad Shaheed?
mcq.one_liner: The real name of Titu Mir, a prominent figure from Western Bengal linked to Sayyid Ahmad Shaheed's movement, was **Syyid Mir Nasir Ali**.
